column2: back to the start: email responsiveness was good.  I was late making a booking
column3: and they were full in OpenTable
column4: but nonetheless - and aided I am sure by my needing to eat at 5 p.m. - they found me a table happily.  The setting is dark heavy wood and Victorian
column5: well-suited to a steakhouse.  Bar service on arrival was a tad supercilious
column6: but to be fair I was ordering only a seltzer water as I waited for my dining companion and it was nothing overt - more of a snarky 'don't get too rowdy now!' attitude :-).  Table was available very promptly
column7: and service from that point on was pretty good: not hovering but attentive.
